trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Winnipeg
There was one other sighting in Winnipeg on or around August 2nd 2013
Summary: Saw orange ball moving silently across sky, change direction then disappear.
divs: sighting detailsstepped out of my house, looked up and saw orange ball\orb moving silently across the night sky. at first i thought it was a plane, but the light didn't flash, and there was no noise at all. it tracked from the northwest, then changed direction due west, appeared to speed up then dimmed out. took a few pics with my phone, but they aren't good enough to show any features. i have seen chinese lanterns in the sky, this was no chinese lantern. i have no explanation as to what this object is. will definitely look up more often now.
